messages.message:
:announcements: Hi team! The infra team is planning to replace Opsgenie with Rootly by end of this month (thread (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06AQ7X6SQ7/p1757433804360379)).

Every on-call person should already have access to Rootly, but each on-call person needs to add their contact info to their Rootly profile (instructions (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/x/BQANuw))

Please configure this on Rootly this week or next week, thanks!
